level.heading: Exempt organizations - Regulations.
level.text: The Mayor of the District of Columbia is authorized to promulgate regulations to carry out the purposes of § 47-1802.01(4), this section, and § 47-1802.03 and may amend, by regulation, the appropriate provisions of Title 16 of the District of Columbia Rules and Regulations.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 2-147
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-147, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 471802.01.

level.heading: Delegation of Authority
level.text: Delegation of authority pursuant to Law 2-147, see Mayor's Order 86-134, August 19, 1986.
